Home Schede

Knock Lock Box for Sherlock & IoT

June 14, 2016 — 13:07

MEMBERS:

Elahe Salarzehi, Luca Scudeler, Matteo Lanzetti, Vanessa Libora

ABSTRACT:

The idea came from the collaboration with Crossmedia Factory,that for the event Vaporosamente will propose again Sherlock IoT to the public, an experimentation of “immersive storytelling game”, a kind of role game that requires the creativity of the participants to improve their experience users-creators.

This time, the story is set in Turin, in 1834, during the Universal Exposition. Beyond an amazing Steampunk background there is a mysterious society full of secrets. It’s up to the players trying to solve them all.

This site has been generated with Jekyll, it's based on the -folio theme and is hosted on Github. Officine Arduino © 2016
